description: Search the web using Bing Search API.

bing_subscription_key.info: Your Bing Search API subscription key

input_value.info: The search query to send to Bing

bing_search_url.info: Custom Bing Search API endpoint URL (optional)

k.info: The number of search results to return

logs.initializing_wrapper: Initializing Bing Search wrapper - Has Custom URL: {has_custom_url}, Number of Results: {num_results}
logs.executing_search: Executing search - Query: '{query}', Number of Results: {num_results}
logs.building_tool: Building Bing Search tool - Has Custom URL: {has_custom_url}, Number of Results: {num_results}
